A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
There were just too many questions and plot holes that just sunk the movie for me. These include:
How did Maz Kanata get the lightsaber?
Why doesn't Rey need to train to be powerful?
How did Finn and Rose escape after crashing in front of the new AT-AT's?
Why would LUKE spare Vader yet try to murder his nephew AND become a recluse?
Why would Luke need to hide so deep if he could project himself all over the Galaxy?
Why would Luke bother leaving a map?
How did Leia fly like Superman?
Why wouldn't people lightspeed kamikaze earlier in the saga or more often in general?
Who was Snoke and why was he so powerful?
Where were the Knights of Ren?
